targetFrame.title: Relative Target
targetFrame.description: Targets and waypoints defined in target surface frame

robot.description: Name of robot on which this surface is defined

translation.description: Offset in translation wrt to the target robot's surface

rotation.description: Offset in rotation wrt to the target robot's surface

controlPoints.description: Position waypoints (pairs of time and position)

oriWaypoints.description: Orientation waypoints (pairs of time and orientation)

target.description: Target relative to world. Ignored if targetFrame is specified, required otherwise

controlPoints.description: Position waypoints relative to world (pairs of time and position). Ignored if targetFrame is specified

oriWaypoints.description: Orientation waypoints relative to world (pairs of time and orientation) relative to the world. Ignored if targetFrame is specified

init_vel.description: Initial velocity (world). Ignored if targetFrame is specified

init_acc.description: Initial acceleration (world). Ignored if targetFrame is specified

end_vel.description: Final velocity (world). Ignored if targetFrame is specified

end_acc.description: Final acceleration (world). Ignored if targetFrame is specified
